extendedInfo.description: This is the useful app to detect your followers.Immediately you can know the follower you don't follow back and follow them all at once.Immediately you can know who unfollowed you and unfollow them back!And so many other features..Check the "Follow Tool" and enjoy your Twitter Life!â â  Points+ Simple and easy operation+ Handy batch follow/unfollow/block+ List of people who unfollowed you recently+ History graphâ â  Features- The list of people who unfollowed you recently- The list of people who are following you but you do not follow yet- The list of people you follow but not followed by- The list of people who unfollowed you recently- The list of new follower- Sort the list by the count of tweets- Blocked users list- User search- Batch follow/ unfollow/ block- Follow, unfollow, block your follower individually- Check the profile of followers- Multiple accounts(10accounts)- Background process- History graphand many other features...â  Notes- If you don't launch this app for more than 5 days, the list of people who unfollowed you and the new followers is not created correctly.-This app and darjjeelling don't have any relationship with Twitter inc.-This product uses the Twitter API but is not endorsed or certified by Twitter.- If you have over 75,000 followers+followings, this app cannot work well because of the limits of TwitterAPI.â  SupportIf you have any questions or requests, please access the following Twitter.@follow_check

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t let me down. Don\'t believe these people saying the app messes up their Twitter data because the app is solely showing who follows or unfollows. That is probably 99% their own fault. One thing is I just got an unfollow and when I look it says there\'s a Fetch Error, please help me fix that.
reviews.author: Robert Duvall

reviews.title: Overall a great tool
reviews.comment: They don\'t try to get money from you other than ads, and they remove what you ask them too. Install kept popping up like it was in a loop so far pleased.
reviews.author: Rick Binkley

reviews.title: Does everything I need
reviews.comment: The batch following/unfollowing feature is so useful
reviews.author: Sarmad S

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Not even accurate so you may unfollow people who are following you
reviews.author: Shannon Hartill

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It unfollowed HALF of my followers when I unfollowed the non-followers. This app messes up Twitter data. DO NOT INSTALL!
reviews.author: Kayla Hawley

reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
reviews.comment: I have been searching for an app that un follows people that are not following me and this is it.
reviews.author: Matt Fox

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: It works but it crashes a lot please fix
reviews.author: Joshua Davis

reviews.comment: It gives me incorrect numbers and it crashes.
reviews.author: Ruth Musser
